name: Christmas Stories: Puss in Boots HD - A Magical Hidden Object Game
name_original: Christmas Stories: Puss in Boots HD - A Magical Hidden Object Game
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

You’ve adopted an abandoned kitten on Christmas Eve, but little did you know that such an innocent creature would bring with it a big adventure!

• JOURNEY THROUGH SANTA’S ENCHANTED TOY TOWN
You’re woken up one night by your furry new pet and discover that he can walk and talk! He needs help and you’re his only hope.

• FIND OUT WHAT THE SNEAKY PUSS IN BOOTS IS UP TO
Play inventive puzzles and tricky mini-games to stop the mischievous cat from creating a festive disaster.

• WILL YOU BE ABLE TO SAVE CHRISTMAS BEFORE IT’S RUINED?
Search through festive hidden object scenes and find the tools you need to protect the beloved holiday!

• CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS IN OTHER LANDS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Continue your adventure in the bonus game and enjoy Collector’s Edition exclusives including a strategy guide and collectible morphing objects!
